message.content:
To identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period, we typically look at the "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS) on the income statement. COGS represents the direct costs attributable to the production of the goods that were sold, which includes the carrying amount of inventories sold.

From the problem:

| Account           | Amount    | Date       |
|-------------------|-----------|------------|
| Cost of Goods Sold| 3175000.00| 2024-01-28 |

Thus, the carrying amount of inventories sold is 3,175,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "3175000.00"}}
```
